Get Division-I statistical trends

kp_trends.Rd

Get Division-I statistical trends

kp_trends()

Value

A data frame with 19 columns:

Season

double.

Efficiency

double.

Tempo

double.

eFG.Pct

double.

TO.Pct

double.

OR.Pct

double.

FTRate

double.

FG_2.Pct

double.

FG_3.Pct

double.

FG_3A.Pct

double.

FT.Pct

double.

A.Pct

double.

Blk.Pct

double.

Stl.Pct

double.

NonStl.Pct

double.

AvgHgt

double.

Continuity

double.

HomeWin.Pct

double.

PPG

double.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
 kp_trends()
}
